enhanced_by.reason: Setting the required state before adding options ensures the group's requirement is correctly applied.
Checking the selected option before adding a new one can help ensure no conflicts arise from pre-selected options.
The getNames method can be used to verify that the option has been correctly added to the group.
The getOptions method can be used to verify that the option has been correctly added to the group.
The toString method can be used to verify the string representation of the group, ensuring the added option is correctly reflected.
